# JfifMetadata.FindFirstIndex method

Finds the first segment with the specified key in the JFIF metadata.

```csharp
public int FindFirstIndex(SegmentKey segmentKey)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| segmentKey | The key of the segment to find. |

## Return Value

Returns the index of the first segment with the specified key, or `-1` if it was not found.
